brainly_data.question: How can genetic engineering help improve crop production? a. Genetic engineering can eliminate the threat of disease to crops. b. Genetic engineering removes the need of plants for watering. c. Genetic engineering can help reduce the effects of pests and weather on crop production. d. Genetic engineering can make crops more susceptible to herbicides.
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: How can genetic engineering help improve crop production? a. Genetic engineering can eliminate the threat of disease to crops. b. Genetic engineering removes the need of plants for watering. c. Genetic engineering can help reduce the effects of pests and weather on crop production. d. Genetic engineering can make crops more susceptible to herbicides.
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text:
I think it should be answer c, because some types of genetic engineering make the plant produce liquid that make bugs die if they ingest it.

Brainliest plz.
